Lucy Bloomfield

Hey, I'm Lucy :)

I’m the Co-Founder of Trefiel - think skin care meets self-care - which I started with my partner, Michael Tremeer, when we saw the opportunity to spoil and pamper women everywhere (and teach them how to love themselves too).

I think we have the best face masks ever but I have to admit, I’m very biased.


If you're looking for

  • Case studies on what has and hasn't worked while growing my ecommerce business
  • Detailed breakdowns of processes and templates for structuring a company (with a special focus on it being run remotely)
  • Templates for marketing and operational structres that I use on a day-to-day basis
  • Plus basically everything in between because it's my blog and I'll do what I want

Then this is the place for you.


Let's jump in :)

Quade

Quade was the first foster cat that into our home and he was also one of the most difficult. Nobody knew Quade’s full story but we did know that he had been surrendered to a local pound and he was very near to being put to sleep.
